name: Get Your Shine On Frizz Control Hair Styling Value Set
about: What it is: A limited-edition hair-styling full size duo with a must-have hair cream and oil—for up to 72 hours of frizz control and smooth, soft styles with 125 percent more shine...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage.- Frizz.- Shine..Key Benefits: - Controls frizz for smoother hair.- Dramatically boosts shine and softness.- Visibly strengthens and reduces breakage..Highlighted Ingredients:- Patented Olaplex Bond-Building Technology™: Repairs broken bonds for stronger-looking hair..- Blend of Coconut-Derived Emollient, Vitamin E, and Sunflower Seed Oil: Conditions, smooths, and adds shine..- Cationic Conditioning Agents: Provide softening and anti-static benefits that smooth the cuticle...Ingredient Callouts: These products are vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Get full sizes of top Olaplex styling products for sleek, soft, hydrated, healthy-looking hair. The No. 6 Bond Smoother Frizz Control Styling Hair Cream.is anti-frizz and humidity resistant for frizz-free air-drying and smoother blow-drying. The bestselling No. 7 Bonding Frizz Reduction & Heat Protectant Hair Oil dramatically boosts shine, reduces signs of breakage, and protects from heat...Clinical Results: In a controlled study, No. 6 Bond Smoother Frizz Control Styling Hair Cream and No. 7 Bonding Frizz Reduction & Heat Protectant Hair Oil provided:.- 72 hours of frizz control and humidity resistance..No. 7 Bonding Frizz Reduction & Heat Protectant Hair Oil:.In a controlled study, compared to bleached hair without application of No. 7 Bonding Frizz Reduction & Heat Protectant Hair Oil, results showed:.- 125% more shine.- 77% reduction in breakage.- Heat protection up to 450°F..This Set Contains:- 3.3 oz/ 100 mL No. 6 Bond Smoother Frizz Control Styling Hair Cream (full size).- 1 oz/ 30 mL No. 7 Bonding Frizz Reduction & Heat Protectant Hair Oil (full size)
ingredients: -Patented Olaplex Bond-Building Technology™: Repairs broken bonds for stronger-looking hair..-Blend of Coconut-Derived Emollient, Vitamin E, and Sunflower Seed Oil: Conditions, smooths, and adds shine..-Cationic Conditioning Agents: Provide softening and anti-static benefits that smooth the cuticle...No. 6 Bond Smoother Frizz Control Styling Hair Cream:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Isohexadecane, Coco-Caprylate, Neopentyl.Glycol Diheptanoate, Behentrimonium Chloride, Isododecane, Phenyl Trimethicone,.Propanediol, Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Cetrimonium Chloride, Glyceryl Stearate,.Isopropyl Alcohol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate,.Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein PG-Propyl Silanetriol, Disodium.EDTA, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Gigartina Stellata Extract, Glyoxal, Chondrus Crispus.(Carrageenan) Extract, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Ascorbic Acid,.Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Phytantriol, Pseudozyma Epicola/Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil.Ferment Extract Filtrate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis.Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Potassium.Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Citral, Linalool,.Citronellol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal...No. 7 Bonding Frizz Reduction & Heat Protectant Hair Oil:.Dimethicone, Isohexadecane, C13-14 Isoalkane, Coco-Caprylate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Bis-Aminopropyl Diglycol Dimaleate, Propanediol, Zea Mays (Corn) Oil, Beta-Carotene, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Punica Granatum Seed Oil, Water/Aqua/Eau, Morinda Citrifolia Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Pseudozyma Epicola/Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil Ferment Extract Filtrate, Fragrance (Parfum), Citral, Linalool, Limonene, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.No. 6 Bond Smoother Frizz Control Styling Hair Cream:.-Apply to clean, damp hair..-Comb through and style as desired..-Begin with one pump, adding more as needed. ..No. 7 Bonding Frizz Reduction & Heat Protectant Hair Oil:.-Remove cap, turn the bottle upside down, and gently tap your index finger on the bottom of the bottle to dispense a metered drop..-Apply two to three drops to damp or dry hair..-Style as desired...When to use:.-No. 6 Bond Smoother Frizz Control Styling Hair Cream can be used on damp hair any time you style..-No. 7 Bonding Frizz Reduction & Heat Protectant Hair Oil can be used daily on wet and dry hair, or before styling with heat..-Layer or mix No. 6 and No. 7.

reviews.review_title: A great combo for any routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this combination of products from Olaplex! As a hair stylist I am always looking for great lineups to recommend to my clients, especially around the holidays! This set would be a great addition to anyone’s hair care lineup, especially anyone who has color or sun damage. Living in Florida I also need a good frizz control set, and these products do not disappoint. I love to use the No. 6 Bond Smoother and No. 7 Binding Oil in combination with one another after my hair washing days. It leaves my hair smooth, controlled, and soft whether I air dry or blow dry. As always I love using Olaplex products because of the heat protectant that is included, so this is a huge plus when I do choose to use heat. The No. 7 Binding Oil has also been a great on-the-go product when the frizz becomes too much on a hot and humid day. The smell is always a bonus too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely, loving oplex.Get your shine on the sleek, hairstyling, paired with Olaplex No.6 Bond Smoother and Olaplex No.7 Binding Oil.  These two definitely work to fight frizz and signs of damaged hair, and don't forget about flyaways. I love the bond smoother can either go on damp or dry hair. It's easy to work into hair. I personally apply it to damp here. Once my hair is dry, I like to add in the bonding oil, which helps my hair lock in the No.6 bonding smoother and leaves my hair looking flawless the next 72 hours.   The texture of No.6 is creamy and lightweight, and No.5 is liquidity but not sticky. I like how my hair looks and have received many compliments. The ingredients are great and safe. I will continue to use this product in my hair routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Get Your Shine On Frizz Control Set by Olaplex is perfect for anyone battling frizzy, untamable hair like me. This set includes the No. 6 bond smoother and No. 7 bonding hair oil that work together to tame frizz and enhance shine. The formula is infused with Olaplex’s signature Bond Building Technology, which strengthens hair from within, reducing breakage and promoting a healthier look. My hair felt noticeably softer and more manageable after just one use. I have been using No.6 for years now and have loved all of the benefits from continued use. The scent is subtly pleasant, and a little product goes a long way especially for the oil. The price is such a great deal for those who want to try both of these products at a discounted price. Perfect for achieving sleek, shiny locks without weighing down your hair. Highly recommend for anyone seeking to improve texture and shine.

reviews.review_title: Shine, Smoothness, and Frizz Control in One Kit
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m always on the lookout for products that make managing my hair easier, especially since it tends to get frizzy and dry. The OLAPLEX Get Your Shine On Frizz Control Hair Set was exactly what I needed to tame my hair while boosting its shine. Over the course of my use, I found that the No. 6 Bond Smoother® really helped in reducing frizz and keeping my hair smooth throughout the day. It made my blow-dry sessions a breeze, leaving my hair soft and manageable. The No.7 Bonding Oil™ added a noticeable shine that I hadn’t seen in my hair for a while. The combination of these two products provided me with a sleek, healthy look without weighing my hair down. The texture of the No. 6 Bond Smoother® was creamy but light, making it easy to distribute through my damp hair. The No. 7 Bonding Oil™ was lightweight and absorbed quickly, leaving no greasy residue. If your hair is dry or lacks luster, this set could be a game-changer in restoring shine and smoothness.  **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm naturally a curly girl who doesn't mind a bit of frizz in my curls because I like to wear my hair big and full - I like the complete opposite look for when I straighten my hair. It has to be sleek, frizz free and shiny.  The Olaplex Get Your Shine On Frizz Control Set delivers the desired results for my straightened hair styles. I start with no.6 while my hair is damp, blow dry it until it's dry and straight enough, then I apply no.7 - the bonding oil - from root to end before flat ironing the hair stick straight. I apply a little more oil overall making sure to get the fly aways and leaving some shine.   I love that these products alone and together done weigh down my hair. It's perfectly balanced and leaves my hair soft, smooth and shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely thick 3a bleached blonde hair that I straighten weekly and have for... over a decade now! I can credit Olaplex for the fact that my hair is down to my waist with no breakage issues! I went from wearing extensions to needing hair cuts because my hair grows so strong and long! As Olaplex releases new products, my hair health only improves even more beyond what I thought was possible! This anti-frizz kit makes it so that I can use less heat as my straightened hair stays straight and frizz free. No touch ups with my iron means less exposure to damaging heat! Once I straighten my hair, it stays sleek, even in Florida humidity! I used to travel with my hair iron and now I don't because I know these products will keep my hair flawless for days.  After my wash day, I apply no. 7 to my slightly damp hair. My hair being damp helps it spread easily once I use a wet-safe brush to coat all my strands evenly. I let my hair air dry and then straighten it with 100% assurance that Olaplex no.7 protects me from my flat iron's heat. I use 350 degrees F and no.7 protects up to 450 degrees F for those who need more heat to get straight. Even better, my hair smells so incredible and it's left with a glossy shine (which is very hard to attain as a platinum blonde). Last, I apply no. 6 and blow dry my hair into a blowout hairstyle. No. 7 provides protection and shine while no. 6 provides humidity and frizz protection. I have such a smooth bouncy glossy blowout when I pair these two together and I love knowing that not only do I look great, but my hair is being repaired from within.

reviews.review_title: Love the way my hair feels and looks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have curly hair that turns in to a big frizz ball even after I flat iron it. When using  Olaplex No. 6 and No. 7, from the Get Your Shine On Sleek Hair Styling Duo, I have let my hair air dry and instantly noticed when my hair is curly and dries it is almost completely frizz free; however, when I wake up my hair has gotten some frizz due to my movements when I’m sleeping. I love how my hair looks, it is healthier and shiny. Once I flat iron my hair it is smooth and sleek. No. 6 smells good and has a cream consistency. It doesn’t feel greasy in your hair at all. I do like to add a little bit more of both products to my dry hair for more shine and for heat protection. The No. 7 oil bottle is hard to get the oil out of, you have to shake it onto your hand. I wish there was like a dropper or a pump to get the oil out instead. I do love that this oil is a heat protectant up to 450°. I can’t get over how soft my hair feels. This duo doesn’t feel like it weighs my hair down, in fact it feels nice a light. I really like these two products, especially as a set.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the Olaplex Get Your Shine On Frizz Control Hair Set has exceeded my expectations. The No. 6 Bond Smoother and No. 7 Bonding Hair Oil work in harmony to address key concerns of thick, dry hair, including frizz, flyaways, and visible damage. The No. 6 provides excellent frizz control and hydration, making my hair feel smooth and manageable. The No. 7 enhances shine and offers heat protection, giving my hair a polished look without adding weight.  For those with straight, medium thickness hair that shows damage easily, this set is a valuable addition to your hair care arsenal. The combination of these two products not only improves the texture and appearance of your hair but also makes the daily maintenance routine simpler and more effective. If you’re looking for a reliable solution to tame frizz, add shine, and protect your hair, the Olaplex Get Your Shine On Frizz Control Hair Set is definitely worth considering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Olaplex “Get Your Shine On” set, which includes the No. 6 Bond Smoother and No. 7 Bonding Oil, and I love it! My hair is usually dry and dull, even though I don’t color it. I use a hair dryer and flat iron a lot, so I needed something to help with frizz and add moisture. The No. 6 Bond Smoother is a leave-in cream that keeps my hair smooth and frizz-free for days. I like that you can use it with a blow dryer or when letting your hair air dry. You only need one pump of the No. 6 and a little bit of the No. 7, so the bottles will last a long time. The oil is light but very effective, and it protects my hair from heat, which is perfect since I use a flat iron often. The light scent is also lovely and not overpowering, which I really appreciate. It’s also a very beautiful set, and I’m thinking of ordering it for my mom and sister for Christmas. Olaplex always makes great products, and this set is no different. After using it, my hair feels more hydrated and looks shinier. I'm so glad I found this set! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have textured hair and am always looking for products that can help me control my frizz. This set by olaplex is not only high quality, but is an absolutely amazing value! You get two full sized products in this set.   I love the no. 6 leave in bond smoother for using in my hair when it is wet and still drying. It helps keep my hair nourished and hydrated! I then go in with the no. 7 bonding oil once my hair is dry, usually after I style it. It brings shine and life back to my hair and makes it look so healthy! Both of these products are easy to use, an amazing texture, and smell great! They leave my hair looking nourished and healthy until my next wash day.   I love that both these products also work to repair my hair from the inside out. It's great to know that while I'm using these products, they keep working in my hair to keep it healthy and fight damage! I think this set is an amazing value for two high quality hair products and I would highly recommend it!   This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: Get Your Shine On Frizz Control Hair Styling Value
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oils are super important to me. The hair needs oil to help with any decreasing oil retention levels or to bring that slight shine back to the hair. This sleek hair-shining duo from Olaplex is one of a kind. It comes with a bonding oil and it's legendary no.6 bond smoother. I'm always down for any hair product that either builds, repairs, or restores but also keeps hair with a natural rich luster. The bonding oil comes with moringa and sunflower seed oil. This oil brings nourishment but also keeps it locked in and intertwines within each strand. A little goes a long way with this oil and I love how the opening dropper controls how much the hair actually needs versus just adding an unnecessary amount of oil to the hair. This oil does not weigh down the hair at all, which I thoroughly enjoyed about the bonding oil. The bond smoother was great because I used this before doing a blowout on my hair. This cream helped with the blowout process because my hair was more manageable but it also cut down the time to where I had to use various tools or add more product to achieve better results. This duo is a match made in heaven. Olaplex will never steer you in the wrong direction when it comes to maintaining healthy hair or correcting strands that need more time to replenish/restore to its highest potential.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have 3c curly hair, and this kit has been a lifesaver for my hair. The duo they included is the best combination they could have chosen. Both products are full size and they absolutely are the best of the best, they aren't just regular styling products, they also benefit my hair by repairing it with the patented Olaplex Bond-Building Technology. I usually use them together, but sometimes I use one without the other, the result is always beautiful, the No. 6 Bond Smoother is fantastic for taming my frizz, even in humid conditions. It leaves my hair feeling smooth to the touch, and a little goes a long way. It's not sticky and doesn't leave any residue on my hair. The No. 7 Bonding Oil is the most amazing hair oil I have ever tried. Just a few drops, and the shine is incredible! It doesn't weigh down my curls, it's not sticky, and the best part, it even doubles as heat protection! I highly recommend this kit to anyone searching for the best duo of hair products on the market, they complement each other perfectly and deliver amazing results.

reviews.review_title: OLAPLEX Get Your Shine On Frizz Control Hair Set
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion.  I loved the Olaplex:  Get Your Shine On Frizz Control Hair Set immediately. From the moment I unboxed it to see the gorgeous gold packaging to beholding the beautiful golden oil in its thoughtful, sleek bottle to efficiently applying the leave-in bond smoother from a perfect pump allocator I was hooked. My 4C hair enjoyed the moisturizing of the oil and leave-in overnight while my hair set on heatless rollers. In the morning, I had a smooth take-down and I enjoyed my loose, soft curls until lunchtime. In all fairness, I was in humid weather today so it was difficult to maintain the style. (See pic) However, my hair remained hydrated, and I could quickly and happily fashion an adorable chignon with no need for extra product or fuss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite brands is Olaplex. At this point, I had my hair colored and bleached. I was amazed by how well this duo actually accomplishes what it claims to. When my hair was still 70% moist, I applied a mixture of two pumps of No. 6 and one drop of No. 7. I worked the mixture from the root to the end. After that, I blow-dried my hair as usual. My fine, straight Asian hair, which has been bleached and dyed, is considerably less frizzy and has improved texture and its shine. My hair is noticeably softer now that I've blow dried it. My hair feels so smooth without being slippery is a plus!      I typically give my hair a wash once every two days. When I need to add a little extra shine and smoothness in between washes, No. 7 works excellent on the first or even the second hair day. When I wash my hair, I use No. 6 to keep it looking and feeling fresh.     My hair continues to be smoother and less frizzy even though I live in a hot, humid climate. There are two full-sized No. 6 and No. 7 in this Get your shine on collection. This means that the set will last for a considerable amount of time as well. I heartily endorse these pair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who deals with frizz often with my 2a hair that is just below my waist, I was very excited to see how well this kit would work for me and let me say after trying out this amazing kit, I love the results. I love that you can use either product on its own, mix them, or layer them. Both have a nice fragrance to them that is not overpowering and more on the subtle side.  The No. 6 Bond Smoother Frizz Control Styling Hair Cream has a nice creamy texture and it does not take a lot of product to use on the hair, even for someone like me with very long hair. It is very lightweight and doesn't weigh down my hair at all. I prefer to use it right after the shower since it's suggested to use on damp hair.  As for the the No. 7 Bonding Frizz Reduction & Heat Protectant Hair Oil, while it is an oil, it did not leave my hair feeling oily at all nor did it leave my hands feeling oily after applying. I love that you can turn it upside down and the oil doesn't come out until you tap on the bottom of the bottle. The way it dispenses makes you only get the amount you want. Due to the length and amount of hair I have, I did use a little more than the recommended 2-3 drops but just like with the cream, it doesn't take a lot of product either. While I have used it after using the No. 6 hair cream, I also have used it on dry hair as needed on its own.  *This review was collected as part of a promotion*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a postpartum mom whose hair is finally starting to grow back… I need all the help I can get with dull frizzy hair. Olaplex came in handy with this one! I have previously bought the number 7 oil and really enjoyed it! I like that it is also a heat protectant. I can use this every single day if I wanted to! It makes my hair look great and a lot less frizzy. This was my first time trying number 6 and I really enjoyed it. I apply it to damp hair, then use number 7 and blow dry my hair and it looks like I left the salon! I love that it’s working to repair my hair. I’ve been struggling lately with hair breakage and I know products can’t fix all the damage but it’s definitely working to help erase some of it! I’m truly thankful for these products and the confidence boost this is giving me.

reviews.review_title: Great for dealing with frizz on and after wash day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have very long, fine, 2b, s-wavy hair with all the issues that come with that - frizz, flattened waves, etc. I have been trying to find leave in products that help with my frizz and waves, but products either seem to weigh down my hair or just don’t do anything. I was particularly impressed with the hair oil (No 7) which feels more like an oily serum than a straight oil to me. Instead of weighing my hair down like all other oils I’ve tried, this almost seems to add more structure and strength to my hair. I like smoothing it into my hair while it’s a little damp or the days after wash day when my hair is starting to look a little frizzy. This oil does not sit on top of my hair but seems to absorb quickly, so it does not make my hair look greasy. I use the leave in smoother (No 6) in place of my usual leave in conditioner and it does a much better job of keeping my hair soft and conditioned. It does a great job smoothing my frizzy hair, while letting my waves show through, but is great with the hair oil layered on top. I would recommend this set to anyone who has issues with frizz, especially if you have issues with leave in products weighing down your hair.

reviews.review_title: Tamed, Soft, Smooth, AND Healthy Hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After trying out these two products in tandem with one another, I am quite literally amazed at the results. To begin, these two products were the first products that I have ever tried from Olaplex, so I truly did not know what to expect as I never had any previous experience with the brand. I have super thick, and very long hair so finding products that don't weigh it down even more can be quite the challenge. However, to my surprise, no. 6 (Bond Smoother) did just the opposite! My hair has never been so tamed from using this product alone. I typically get a lot of flyaways at the very top of my head but after applying about a 1/2 -1 pump to my hair the frizz is nonexistent. As I also mentioned before, it does not weigh my hair down either. After blow drying and styling, I go in and also use the tiniest amount of no. 7 (hair oil) from the set. Let me just tell you, my hair has never looked AND felt so good. The hair oil is also super lightweight and a little goes a very long way. It makes my hair look so healthy and shiny. I truly am so pleased with both these two products especially when used together! This set would make the perfect gift for just about anyone, but especially those who love to care for their hair. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have much experience testing out hair care products from variety of brands. I have highlighted, fine, long, wavy hair that is definitely damaged and tends to get frizzy especially in humid weather. This duo has been amazing for my hair. After using these two products, my hair looks so much stronger, shinier, and less frizzy. I have received many compliments about my hair and been asked if I just got my hair done.
